title: UCSD Capstone Project: Generative AI for Good
description: Data Science final project working under Dr. Ali Arsanjani, Director of Googles AI program. Working towards combining Predictive and Generative AI methods to analyze news articles and return truthfulness scores to better inform people of the reliability of news.

title: Boston and Cambridge Interactive Bike Paths Map
description: This project displays the bike routes and bike traffic flow at various stations within the Boston and Cambridge areas at different times of day.

title: Food Insecurity and Waste on a Global Scale
description: Zoey Zhao and I created this project that takes a look at the global food insecurity and food waste problem, and how it has changed over the years. Visualizations are interactive and presented in an order to tell a story about this global issue.

title: Social Medias Impact on Mental Health and Focus in Youths and Adults
description: This project took a deeper look at the correlation between varying social media usage and self-perceived levels of focus and health.

title: How Does Monthly Rainfall in San Diego Affect Traffic Injury Counts?
description: Exploratory data visualization project to see how monthly rainfall levels in San Diego affect number of injuries from car related accidents in the year 2023.

title: How Much Has Continental Internet Usage Changed Across The Last Two Decades?
description: This exploratory visualization project took a deeper look into how internet usage has changed across different continents in the last two decades.
